name: Today's Boon
desc: A vegetable salad. The freshest fruits and vegetables are selected and arrayed alongside rye bread and sprinkled with dressing, making for a delicious and satisfying dish that finds its way daily onto the tables of pious Frostmoon Scions.

value.text: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
